data.eml:eml: The lygaeoid bug genus Sadoletus Distant (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Heterogastridae) from Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ban, Teruaki, Ishikawa, Tadashi (2013): The lygaeoid bug genus Sadoletus Distant (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Heterogastridae) from Japan. Zootaxa 3609 (2): 195-203, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3609.2.5
